parameter.value: job;offer;king;arturo;kitchenz;casteldine;castle dine;name;food;natalon;tableware;utensil;accessories;vegetable;fruit;dragon;sweet;sten;tommy;jooko;terepido;zertic;doc;dallheim;dallrim;past;demon
I am serving King Arturo my wonderful food.
I can offer you food, sweets, fruits, vegetables, tableware and utensil.
The king is a very, very grand person. Long live him.
The king is a very, very grand person. Long live him.
This is the worlds best kitchen. Really.
Welcome to Casteldine.
Castle Dine is the name of this castle. Isn't it catchy?
Churry, cherry, curry, cherries. Jerry?
I sell food and I make food. For example, I can offer you rolls, salmon, shrimps, fish, meat, ham, fire mushrooms, brown bread and normal bread. Also, I have vegetables and fruits.
So many stories I have been told about this man. Truly amazing.
For you I have cups, forks, jugs, kitchen knifes, plates, mugs and spoons.
I have various sorts of utensil in store. Firstly, we have the tableware of course. Secondly, I also have cooking accessories.
I have baking trays, cleavers, oven spatulas, pans, rolling pins and candelabrums. Are you interested in buying any?
I can offer you corncobs, carrots, cheese, tomatoes, and different coloured egg - and of course normal egg too.
I have pumpkins, mangoes, melon, pears, grapes, apples, bananas, blueberries, cherries, strawberries and oranges.
I have no dragon hams in store, |PLAYERNAME|. They are quite rare here.
I can offer you sweet valentines cake and yummy cookies.
Sten is my close friend.
Tommy and I have been friends for very long.
Don't listen to this fool. He spreads lies about me, don't trust a word about him! I'M NOT A DEMON!
He's new in the service of His Royal Highness.
Believe it or not, I have known him for ages. But he denies it.
He used to be famous, but don't tell him I told you that. He'll be mad with me. We've had our clashses, you know.
I am always in debt to his family.
I REGRET IT! MY SOUL... I COULDN'T DO ANYTHING. FORGIVE ME!
My past is taboo! Don't talk to me about it! DO YOU HEAR ME, |PLAYERNAME|!?
I AM NOT A DEMON! I HAVE NEVER BEEN A DEMON! LISTEN TO ME, IT IS LIES!

Hello, |PLAYERNAME|! Welcome to the worlds best kitchen.
Hope to see you again.
